author: LinOnetwo
description: Add inverse link (bi-directional link) and folder information to the bottom of tiddlers

overflow: initial; } .inverse-link-and-folder-card-content { height: 130px; overflow: hidden; } <%endif%> "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/components/card-variable.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/components/card-variable.css","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":"\rules only filteredtranscludeinline transcludeinline macrodef macrocallinline html .inverse-link-and-folder-card { background: <>; } .inverse-link-and-folder-card-reference > a.tc-tiddlylink { background: <>; } .inverse-link-and-folder-card-reference > a.tc-tiddlylink:hover { color: <>; background: <>; } "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/components/card.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/components/card.css","text":".inverse-link-and-folder-card{font-size:.75em;padding:.5rem;list-style:none;margin-top:3rem;margin-bottom:0;display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;max-height:250px;overflow-y:auto}.inverse-link-and-folder-card-title{font-size:1.25em;width:100%;padding:.5rem 0;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-between}.inverse-link-and-folder-card-close{background:unset;border:none}.inverse-link-and-folder-card-sub-title{font-size:1em;width:100%;padding:.25rem 0}.inverse-link-and-folder-card-reference{width:250px;max-width:50%}.inverse-link-and-folder-card-reference>a.tc-tiddlylink{color:inherit;background:inherit;display:block;text-decoration:none;padding:.5rem;height:130px;overflow:hidden;position:relative;transition:125ms}@media (max-width:815px){.inverse-link-and-folder-card-reference{width:50%}.inverse-link-and-folder-card-reference>a.tc-tiddlylink{height:80px}}.inverse-link-and-folder-card-reference>a.tc-tiddlylink:hover{text-decoration:none}.inverse-link-and-folder-card-content a.tc-tiddlylink{color:inherit!important;text-decoration:none!important;pointer-events:none}","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/css"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/components/card":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/components/card","text":"\procedure lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/ \procedure inverse-link-and-folder-card(filter,lingoKey) \whitespace trim <%if [subfilter] -[is[current]] +[limit[1]] %>
  • <$transclude $variable="lingo" title=<>/>
    • <$list filter=<>>
  • <$link> <$transclude field="caption"> <$view field="title"/>
    <$transclude field="text" mode="inline" />
    • <%endif%> \end "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/components/list.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/components/list.css","text":".inverse-link-and-folder-list{display:flex;flex-direction:row;flex-wrap:wrap;max-height:250px;overflow-y:auto;padding:0;list-style-type:none;overscroll-behavior:contain;overflow-y:-moz-scrollbars-none}.inverse-link-and-folder-list::-webkit-scrollbar{width:0!important}.inverse-link-and-folder-list li a,.inverse-link-and-folder-list li a:hover{background-color:unset;border:none;padding:5px;line-height:1.8}","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/css"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/components/list":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/components/list","text":"\procedure lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/ \procedure inverse-link-and-folder-list(filter,lingoKey) \whitespace trim <%if [subfilter] -[is[current]] +[limit[1]] %>
  • <$transclude $variable="lingo" title=<>/>
    • <$list filter=<>>

    • <%endif%> \end $basetitle="$:/state/inverse-link-and-folder/show-after-startup" $overwrite="yes" text="yes" />"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/icon","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt") "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/info-area":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/info-area","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","text":"\import [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/configs/show-preview]text[yes]] %>
    • <> <$button class="inverse-link-and-folder-card-close">{{$:/core/images/close-button}}<$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{{ [[$:/state/inverse-link-and-folder/show-manually/]addsuffix] }}} $overwrite="yes" text="no"/>
      • <> <%if [all[current]!subfilter] %> <]" "TagFolderTid">> <%endif%> <] -[]" "SlashFolderTid">> <>
    <%else%>
    • <> <$button class="inverse-link-and-folder-card-close">{{$:/core/images/close-button}}<$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{{ [[$:/state/inverse-link-and-folder/show-manually/]addsuffix] }}} $overwrite="yes" text="no"/>
      • <> <%if [all[current]!subfilter] %> <]" "TagFolderTid">> <%endif%> <] -[]" "SlashFolderTid">> <>
    <%endif%> \end <%if [[$:/state/inverse-link-and-folder/show-after-startup]text[yes]] %> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="hide" animate="yes"> <$let folderExcludeFilter={{$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/configs/folder-exclude-filter}} notShowFolderUnder={{$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/configs/not-show-folder-under}}> <%if [all[current]backlinks[]!is[system]]:else[all[current]!subfiltertagging[]!subfilter]:else[all[current]backtranscludes[]] -[is[current]] +[limit[1]] %> <%if [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/configs/default-show]text[yes]] %> <%if [[$:/state/inverse-link-and-folder/show-manually/]addsuffix!text[no]] %> <> <%endif%> <%else%> <%if [[$:/state/inverse-link-and-folder/show-manually/]addsuffixtext[yes]] %> <> <%endif%> <%endif%> <%endif%> <%endif%> "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Readme","text":"\procedure lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/ ! <> <> !! Features This plugin provides these additional info on the bottom of every tiddler: # other tiddler linking to this tiddler # tiddlers in this folder ## <> ##* <> ## <> ##* <> # tiddlers that transclude this tiddler (tiddlers using `{{}}` syntax to include this tiddler) !! Credits This plugin is inspired by RoamResearch. List style and filter in infobar is learnt from copy&paste-ing of Jeremy's code and tutorials. The card style is based on the [[Reverse Link Panel in Krystal Horizontal Story Flow Plugin|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/blob/d1d0574ce36cd8c7a7f3e88eaa0bc3aa985a9305/plugins/rmnvsl/krystal/references.tid]] and developed further. "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Name":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Name","text":"Backlink references"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Description","text":"Add inverse link (bi-directional link) and folder information to the bottom of tiddlers"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/Description","text":"These settings let you customise the behaviour of "Backlink references" plugin."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/PluginConfigs/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/PluginConfigs/Caption","text":"Plugin Configs"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/show-preview/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/show-preview/Caption","text":"show preview"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/show-preview/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/show-preview/Description","text":"Show the full preview of the tiddler by embedding it when opened, may cause lag, only the title is shown when closed."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/default-show/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/default-show/Caption","text":"default-show"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/default-show/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/default-show/Description","text":"if or not the preview will be shown when the tiddler is opened, you can find the ‘Show Reference’ button in the viewing toolbar after closing."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/folder-exclude-filter/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/folder-exclude-filter/Caption","text":"File exclude filter"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/folder-exclude-filter/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/folder-exclude-filter/Description","text":"tiddlers matched by this filter will not be shown in the folder list of other tiddlers, calendar tiddlers are filtered out by default."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/not-show-folder-under/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/not-show-folder-under/Caption","text":"tiddlers that don't show file lists"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/not-show-folder-under/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/Configs/not-show-folder-under/Description","text":"tiddlers matched by this filter will not be shown under the file list, e.g. if you have already shown it in some other way, you can set it here so that it won't be shown again."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/RelatedReferences":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/RelatedReferences","text":"Related References"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/LinkIn":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/LinkIn","text":"Link In"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/TagFolderTid":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/TagFolderTid","text":"Tag folder content"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/TagFolderTid/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/TagFolderTid/Description","text":"TiddlyWiki tags can represent folders. The list of tags for the sub-tiddlers shown here contains the title of the current tiddler, and the sub-tiddlers are placed in the folder by adding tags. The current tiddler is the folder."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/SlashFolderTid":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/SlashFolderTid","text":"Slash folder content"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/SlashFolderTid/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/SlashFolderTid/Description","text":"The slash in the tilde can indicate a folder, shown here is a sub-tiddler that is placed into a folder by adding a slash to the title of the current tiddler, followed by the title of the sub-tiddler. The current tiddler is the folder."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/BackTransclude":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/BackTransclude","text":"Transcluded by"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/ShowReferences":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/en-GB/ShowReferences","text":"Show References"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Readme","text":"\procedure lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/ ! <> <> !! 功能 本插件在每个条目的底部提供以下附加信息： # 链接到此条目的其他条目（反链） # 此文件夹中的条目 ## <> ##* <> ## <> ##* <> # 被哪些条目嵌入（被使用 `{{}}` 语法嵌入的条目） !! 功劳 本插件的灵感来自 RoamResearch。 信息栏中的列表样式和过滤器是从复制粘贴杰里米的代码和教程中学来的。 卡片样式则是基于[[Krystal横向故事流插件里的反链面板|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/blob/d1d0574ce36cd8c7a7f3e88eaa0bc3aa985a9305/plugins/rmnvsl/krystal/references.tid]]二次开发。 "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Name":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Name","text":"反链引用"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Description","text":"通过这个插件，您可以查看指向当前文档的所有链接。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/Description","text":"通过这些设置，您可以自定义「反链引用」插件的行为。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PluginConfigs/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PluginConfigs/Caption","text":"插件设置"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/show-preview/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/show-preview/Caption","text":"展示预览"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/show-preview/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/show-preview/Description","text":"打开时会通过嵌入完整展示条目预览，可能会导致卡顿，在关闭时只显示标题。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/default-show/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/default-show/Caption","text":"默认展示"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/default-show/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/default-show/Description","text":"是否在打开条目时就展示预览，关闭后可以在查看工具栏里找到「显示引用」按钮。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/folder-exclude-filter/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/folder-exclude-filter/Caption","text":"文件排除筛选器"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/folder-exclude-filter/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/folder-exclude-filter/Description","text":"被这个筛选器匹配的条目将不会被展示在其它条目的文件列表里，默认过滤掉日历条目等。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/not-show-folder-under/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/not-show-folder-under/Caption","text":"不展示文件列表的条目"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/not-show-folder-under/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/Configs/not-show-folder-under/Description","text":"被这个筛选器匹配的条目下不会展示文件列表，例如你已经用其它方式展示了就可以在这里设置让它不重复展示。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/RelatedReferences":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/RelatedReferences","text":"相关引用"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/LinkIn":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/LinkIn","text":"链入"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/TagFolderTid":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/TagFolderTid","text":"标签文件夹内容"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/TagFolderTid/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/TagFolderTid/Description","text":"太微里标签可以表示文件夹，这里展示的子条目的标签列表里含有当前条目的标题，子条目通过加标签而放入文件夹内。当前条目就是文件夹。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/SlashFolderTid":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/SlashFolderTid","text":"斜杠文件夹内容"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/SlashFolderTid/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/SlashFolderTid/Description","text":"太微里斜杠可以表示文件夹，这里展示的是通过在当前条目的标题后加上斜杠，然后跟上子条目标题，从而放入文件夹内的子条目。当前条目就是文件夹。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/BackTransclude":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/BackTransclude","text":"被嵌入"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/ShowReferences":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/ShowReferences","text":"显示引用"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/ShowReferences/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/zh-Hans/ShowReferences/Description","text":"点击显示引用，无引用时点击无效。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/readme","text":"\procedure lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/language/ <> "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/tree":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder/tree","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<>"}}}
title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder
name: inverse-link-and-folder
